robot.navigation

Class Odometer

  • java.lang.Object
    • robot.navigation.Odometer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    lejos.utility.TimerListener

    public class Odometer
extends java.lang.Object
implements lejos.utility.TimerListener
    This class represents the odometer of our robot, will always run as a thread as long as the robot is playing the game
